proposal: Navigating the crypto space without a DEX or a fun Lottery is like running a party without music or games! With 110 holders in the ETH network, why not amplify the vibe? Our tools can help your community deploy their own DEX and Lottery, sharing the revenue while dancing to the blockchain beat. Let's make every token holder not just a guest but a part of the party crew! 🎉🔄🎰
